atk-s0401a4:1: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame adantanti savisevanaṁ adantahatthiassādisadisaṁ. Cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva.
atk-s0401a4:2: 32. Dutiye dantanti nibbisevanaṁ dantahatthiassādisadisaṁ. Imasmimpi suttadvaye vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva kathitaṁ. Yathā cettha, evaṁ ito paresupīti.
atk-s0401a4:5: 35-36. Pañcamachaṭṭhāni arakkhitaṁ rakkhitanti padavasena bujjhanakānaṁ ajjhāsayena vuttāni. Attho panettha purimasadisoyeva.
atk-s0401a4:6: 37-38. Sattamaṭṭhamesupi eseva nayo. Upamā panettha asaṁvutagharadvārādivasena veditabbā.
atk-s0401a4:7: 39-40. Navamadasamāni catūhipi padehi yojetvā vuttāni. Imasmimpi vagge vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
